lead_paragraph: Donald Trump, who has said he really wants to win Iowa, is laser-focused on it as the caucuses draw near, even sleeping in a Holiday Inn Express and showing up for church services.
snippet: Donald Trump, who has said he really wants to win Iowa, is laser-focused on it as the caucuses draw near, even sleeping in a Holiday Inn Express and showing up for church services.

headline.main: Donald Trump Means Business in Iowa: Night in Motel, and a Day in Church
headline.print_headline: Night in Motel, Day in Church: Trump Means Business in Iowa

abstract: Donald Trump attends Presbyterian church service in eastern Iowa, latest indication that he has shifted to campaigning in more populist style as state's primary approaches; Trump has increasingly been deploying tactics and strategies used by more conventional campaigns, contrary to high-drama, media-focused behavior during outset, which led many to wonder how serious he was about securing nomination.
